items.title: Forest Hills
items.body:
Introducing a luxurious and contemporary residence designed for modern living and ultimate comfort in Forest Hills, North Carolina.

This beautiful home spans approximately 3,100 square feet and features four bedrooms and three bathrooms. The main level offers an open-concept layout with a gourmet kitchen seamlessly connected to the great room, along with a full bath and a versatile den.

Upstairs, discover tranquil retreats, including the expansive primary suite with a spa-inspired bathroom. This home includes a two-car garage and offers ample space for storage. Entertainment spaces are thoughtfully designed, featuring a spacious great room and a chef's kitchen on the main level.

  • Charming covered front porch with craftsman-style columns

  • 2-story home with stone and siding exterior

  • 2-car garage with white paneled door

  • A spacious open-concept living space on the main level

  • Gourmet kitchen open to the great room

  • Dormer window adding character to the second floor

  • Walk-in closet in each bedroom

  • The primary bedroom features a large walk-in closet

  • Beautifully landscaped front yard with shrubs and young trees

  • Stone accents on the exterior for added elegance

Discover the perfect blend of luxury and functionality in this stunning home, ideally located in the desirable Forest Hills area. Priced at $750,000, this residence offers exceptional value for its size and features. Embrace modern living in a beautifully designed space tailored to your lifestyle.

items.title: Riverbend Acres
items.body:
Introducing a charming and inviting residence nestled in the picturesque Riverbend Acres community.

This beautiful home offers approximately 2,850 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space, featuring 3 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The main floor boasts an open and airy layout, perfect for both everyday living and entertaining guests.

The heart of the home is a stunning kitchen that flows seamlessly into a spacious family room, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Upstairs, you'll find a luxurious primary suite, complete with a spa-like ensuite bathroom and a generous walk-in closet.

Key features include:

  • Welcoming front porch with classic white columns

  • Beautifully landscaped yard with manicured hedges and mature trees

  • 2-story design with attractive light-colored siding and dark shutters

  • 2-car garage (not visible in image)

  • Large windows allowing ample natural light throughout

  • Covered patio area, perfect for outdoor relaxation

  • Lush green lawn ideal for family activities

  • Thoughtful landscaping with colorful flower beds

  • Quiet, tree-lined setting offering privacy and tranquility

  • Charming white picket fence adding to the property's curb appeal

Priced at $615,000, this Riverbend Acres gem offers the perfect blend of comfort, style, and location. Whether you're looking for a peaceful retreat or a space to create lasting family memories, this home provides the ideal setting. Experience the best of North Carolina living in this delightful suburban oasis.

items.title: Willow Creek
items.body:
Welcome to a stunning residence in the desirable Willow Creek neighborhood, where charm meets modern comfort.

This exquisite home offers 2,770 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space, featuring 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. The property seamlessly blends traditional architecture with contemporary amenities, creating an ideal setting for both family life and entertaining.

On the main level, you'll find an open concept living area that flows effortlessly from the gourmet kitchen to the family room. Upstairs, the primary suite provides a peaceful retreat with a luxurious ensuite bathroom and ample closet space.

Distinctive features include:

  • Unique exterior with a mix of siding styles - horizontal on the main body and vertical on the gable

  • Striking stone accents around the entrance and garage, adding character and texture

  • Covered front porch with elegant arched stonework, perfect for enjoying morning coffee

  • Eye-catching bay window with a copper roof, flooding the interior with natural light

  • Two-car garage with decorative windows, blending functionality with style

  • Beautifully landscaped front yard with a variety of shrubs and ornamental trees

  • Architectural details like shutters and gable vents that enhance curb appeal

  • Warm exterior color palette that complements the natural surroundings

  • Spacious driveway providing additional parking space

  • Charming lamp post adding to the welcoming atmosphere

Priced at $575,000, this Willow Creek gem offers exceptional value in a highly sought-after location. Whether you're drawn to its architectural distinctiveness or its family-friendly layout, this home presents a rare opportunity to own a piece of North Carolina's finest residential offerings. Experience the perfect fusion of comfort and style in this remarkable Willow Creek residence.

items.title: Cedar Ridge
items.body:
Discover tranquil living at its finest in the prestigious Cedar Ridge community. This magnificent residence offers a perfect blend of spaciousness and elegance, nestled among the lush pine forests of North Carolina.

Boasting 3,450 square feet of meticulously designed living space, this home features 5 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms, making it ideal for large families or those who love to entertain. The property seamlessly combines classic charm with modern amenities, creating a living experience that is both luxurious and comfortable.

Key features of this Cedar Ridge gem include:

  • Striking two-tone exterior with crisp white siding and eye-catching blue accents

  • Architectural details including charming dormers and a metal accent roof

  • Expansive windows that flood the interior with natural light

  • Covered front porch perfect for enjoying peaceful mornings or evening relaxation

  • Three-car garage offering ample space for vehicles and storage

  • Picturesque setting surrounded by mature pine trees, providing privacy and a connection to nature

  • Second-floor balcony overlooking the serene landscape

  • Spacious great room with soaring ceilings, ideal for family gatherings

  • Gourmet kitchen with high-end appliances and ample counter space

  • Master suite retreat with luxurious ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet

Priced at $820,000, this Cedar Ridge masterpiece represents the pinnacle of North Carolina suburban living. Whether you're drawn to its generous living spaces, the tranquil wooded setting, or the community's prime location, this home offers an unparalleled lifestyle.

Experience the perfect harmony of natural beauty and refined living in this exceptional Cedar Ridge residence. Don't miss the opportunity to make this house your forever home in one of North Carolina's most sought-after neighborhoods.

items.title: Maple Grove
items.body:
Welcome to this captivating residence in the sought-after Maple Grove neighborhood, where modern design meets family-friendly living.

This impressive home offers 2,950 square feet of thoughtfully crafted living space, featuring 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The property seamlessly blends contemporary architecture with practical amenities, creating an ideal setting for both everyday life and entertaining guests.

Step inside to discover an open-concept main floor that effortlessly flows from the gourmet kitchen to the spacious living areas. Upstairs, you'll find a luxurious primary suite complete with an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet, as well as additional bedrooms perfect for family members or guests.

Standout features include:

  • Attractive exterior with a mix of siding styles and textures for visual interest

  • Covered front porch with elegant stone accents, perfect for relaxation

  • Large windows throughout, allowing for abundant natural light

  • Two-car garage with modern paneled door and built-in windows

  • Second-floor balcony offering views of the neighborhood

  • Low-maintenance landscaping with decorative rock beds and young trees

  • Energy-efficient design with modern insulation and high-quality windows

  • Spacious driveway providing additional parking space

  • Craftsman-inspired architectural details adding character to the facade

  • Prime corner lot location in a family-friendly community

Priced at $645,000, this Maple Grove gem presents an exceptional opportunity to own a piece of North Carolina's finest residential offerings. Whether you're drawn to its stylish design, functional layout, or the vibrant community surrounding it, this home is sure to impress.

Experience the perfect combination of comfort, style, and location in this remarkable Maple Grove residence. Don't miss your chance to make this house your home in one of North Carolina's most desirable neighborhoods.

items.title: Pinehurst Meadows
items.body:
Discover the epitome of refined living in Pinehurst Meadows with this stunning ranch-style home. This exquisite property offers 2,500 square feet of thoughtfully designed living space, featuring 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, perfect for those seeking comfort and style in a single-level layout.

Nestled in a picturesque setting, this Pinehurst Meadows gem combines craftsman charm with modern amenities, creating an inviting atmosphere for both everyday living and entertaining.

Key features of this remarkable home include:

  • Striking exterior with a harmonious blend of stone, shingle, and siding elements

  • Welcoming covered front porch with craftsman-style columns

  • Large picture window allowing abundant natural light into the main living area

  • Spacious single-car garage with attractive carriage-style doors

  • Beautifully landscaped front yard with young evergreens and ornamental plants

  • Architectural details including gable accents and decorative trim work

  • Open concept interior layout perfect for modern living

  • Gourmet kitchen with high-end appliances and ample counter space

  • Master suite with luxurious ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet

  • Energy-efficient design with quality insulation and windows

Priced at $549,000, this Pinehurst Meadows residence offers exceptional value in one of North Carolina's most desirable communities. Whether you're drawn to its charming curb appeal, functional single-level design, or the serene neighborhood setting, this home presents a rare opportunity to embrace a lifestyle of comfort and elegance.

Experience the perfect blend of craftsmanship and contemporary living in this remarkable Pinehurst Meadows home. Don't miss your chance to make this inviting property your personal retreat in the heart of North Carolina's beautiful landscape.

items.title: Oakwood Heights
items.body:
Welcome to this magnificent residence in the prestigious Oakwood Heights community. This stately home offers a perfect blend of classic elegance and modern comfort, ideal for those seeking a distinguished living experience in North Carolina.

Boasting 2,718 square feet of meticulously designed living space, this home features 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. The property seamlessly combines timeless architecture with contemporary amenities, creating an inviting atmosphere for both family life and entertaining.

Key features of this Oakwood Heights gem include:

  • Impressive two-story design with a striking brick facade and vinyl siding

  • Grand entrance with an arched doorway and decorative transom window

  • Elegant balcony overlooking the front yard, perfect for enjoying morning coffee

  • Large, arched Palladian window on the second floor, flooding the interior with natural light

  • Beautifully landscaped front yard with mature trees and well-maintained shrubs

  • Charming shutters in a rich burgundy color, adding character to the exterior

  • Spacious two-car garage (not visible in the image, but included in the property details)

  • Welcoming covered porch with white columns, ideal for outdoor relaxation

  • Seasonal decor touches, such as the wreath on the front door, showcasing the home's warmth

  • Variety of windows allowing for abundant natural light throughout the home

Priced at $620,000, this Oakwood Heights masterpiece represents the epitome of suburban luxury living in North Carolina. Whether you're drawn to its classical architectural elements, the spacious interior layout, or the well-established neighborhood, this home offers an unparalleled lifestyle.

Experience the perfect harmony of traditional design and modern comfort in this exceptional Oakwood Heights residence. Don't miss the opportunity to make this house your home in one of North Carolina's most sought-after communities, where elegance meets family-friendly living.

items.title: Blue Ridge Estates
items.body:
Welcome to this stunning residence in the prestigious Blue Ridge Estates, where luxury meets lakeside living in the heart of North Carolina's scenic landscape.

This magnificent home offers 3,200 square feet of opulent living space, featuring 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The property seamlessly blends Mediterranean-inspired architecture with modern amenities, creating an unparalleled living experience for those who appreciate the finer things in life.

Key features of this Blue Ridge Estates masterpiece include:

  • Impressive exterior with elegant stucco finish and a striking terra cotta tile roof

  • Grand entrance with towering columns and a covered portico

  • Dramatic circular turret with expansive windows, offering panoramic lake views

  • Large arched windows throughout, flooding the interior with natural light

  • Spacious two-car garage, seamlessly integrated into the home's design

  • Lush, professionally landscaped grounds with mature trees and ornamental plants

  • Circular driveway providing ample parking for guests

  • Second-floor balcony perfect for enjoying breathtaking sunsets over the lake

  • Unique architectural details including quoins and decorative cornices

  • Spacious patio area ideal for outdoor entertaining

Priced at $750,000, this Blue Ridge Estates gem represents the pinnacle of North Carolina lakeside living. Whether you're drawn to its striking Mediterranean-inspired architecture, the generous living spaces, or the serene waterfront setting, this home offers an lifestyle of unparalleled luxury and comfort.

Inside, you'll find a gourmet kitchen with high-end appliances, a grand master suite with lake views, and formal living and dining areas perfect for entertaining. The home's open floor plan and large windows make the most of its stunning natural surroundings, bringing the beauty of Blue Ridge Estates into every room.

Experience the perfect harmony of sophisticated design and natural beauty in this exceptional Blue Ridge Estates residence. Don't miss this rare opportunity to own a piece of lakefront paradise in one of North Carolina's most coveted communities.
